items.title: Fever helps the body fight off viruses: But how does it work?
bullets: ‚Ä¢ The nature of a fever and whether it's good or bad has been contested for centuries

items.title: RAM price hikes: the latest on the global memory shortage
bullets: ‚Ä¢ Samsung, SK Hynix, and Micron are shifting resources away from consumer-focused products and toward more lucrative deals with AI companies
‚Ä¢ The biggest names in the AI industry are buying up DRAM memory for their sprawling data centers
‚Ä¢ The result is a severe shortage in RAM for consumer products, contributing to price hikes on the RAM kits used by PC builders
